Package index

All functions

author_scopus()
Find author ids from SCOPUS
check_colleagues()
Title Check duplicates of colleagues
convert_pinyin()
Convert tiddlers with Chinese title into pinyin
get_dois()
Get DOIs from tiddlywiki
reference()
Get reference list for publications from crossref and opencitations
remove_outfiles()
Remove old intermediate files by dates
tws_options()
Set or get options for my package
tws_reset()
Reset global options for pkg
works()
Get works from all resources including ORCID, Scopus
works_authoring()
Title Add authors for works
works_homepage()
Get works from homepage
works_orcid()
Get works from ORCID using ORCID API.
works_scholar()
Get works from Google Scholar
works_scopus()
Get works from Scopus using Scopus API.
works_wos()
Get works from ResearchID using ResearchID API.
